price: Hakika tuliidhalilisha milima pamoja naye ikisabihi jioni na asubuhi pamoja naye.
arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tuliidhalilisha milima pamoja naye, yeye akichuma manufaa kutoka humo, na hiyo milima ikimtakasa Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu na kila upungufu, wakati wa mwisho wa mchana na mwanzo wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
